text: Larry Paul Arnn is an American conservative educator, writer and philanthropist. He has served as the 12th president of Hillsdale College in Hillsdale, Michigan, United States since May 2000.Hillsdale College faculty pageHeritage Foundation Board of Trustees He is a political conservative who has been influenced by the thought of Leo Strauss and his teacher Harry V. Jaffa. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Educators from Arkansas Category:Philanthropists from Arkansas Category:Writers from Arkansas Category:Writers from Michigan Category:Educators from Michigan
title: Larry P. Arnn
